Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Inorganic Chemical/Element/Isotope/Radioisotope/Xenon Xe-133
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A radioisotope of xenon, an element with 54 protons, having gamma emissions and a physical half-life of 5.27 days. Xenon-133 is used in the study of pulmonary function and organ blood flow.
